verses.roman:
"bhāgavatera ṭīkā kichu kariyāchi likhana
āpane mahāprabhu yadi karena śravaṇa"

synonyms: bhāgavatera—on Śrīmad-Bhāgavatam; ṭīkā—commentary; kichu—some; kariyāchi likhana—I have written; āpane—You; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; yadi—if; karena śravaṇa—would hear.
translation: "I have written some commentary on Śrīmad-Bhāgavatam," he said. "Would Your Lordship kindly hear it?"
